alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 31 at 8:53PM CST until February 01 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In South Dakota, Spink, Clark, Deuel and Hamlin Counties. In Minnesota, Big Stone and Traverse Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Pre-existing snow cover will be susceptible to drifting and blowing, resulting in areas of significantly reduced visibility at times, mainly over eastern areas of the advisory.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
